Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: horizontalpodautoscaler kamus-decryptor in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: horizontalpodautoscaler kamus-encryptor in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage secrets
Misconfigurations.Description: Viewing secrets at the cluster-scope is akin to cluster-admin in most clusters as there are typically at least one service accounts (their token stored in a secret) bound to cluster-admin directly or a role/clusterrole that gives similar permissions.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'kamus-controller' shouldn't have access to manage resource 'secrets'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Manage secrets are not allowed. Remove resource 'secrets' from cluster role

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: clusterrole kamus-controller in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Message: clusterrolebinding kamus-controller in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: clusterrolebinding kamus in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: ConfigMap with sensitive content
Misconfigurations.Description: Storing sensitive content such as usernames and email addresses in configMaps is unsafe
Misconfigurations.Message: ConfigMap 'kamus-controller' in 'default' namespace stores sensitive contents in key(s) or value(s) '{"KeyManagement__AES__UseKeyDeriviation", "KeyManagement__Provider"}'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove sensitive content from configMap data value

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: configmap kamus-controller in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: ConfigMap with sensitive content
Misconfigurations.Description: Storing sensitive content such as usernames and email addresses in configMaps is unsafe
Misconfigurations.Message: ConfigMap 'kamus-decryptor' in 'default' namespace stores sensitive contents in key(s) or value(s) '{"KeyManagement__AES__UseKeyDeriviation", "KeyManagement__Provider"}'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove sensitive content from configMap data value

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: configmap kamus-decryptor in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: ConfigMap with sensitive content
Misconfigurations.Description: Storing sensitive content such as usernames and email addresses in configMaps is unsafe
Misconfigurations.Message: ConfigMap 'kamus-encryptor' in 'default' namespace stores sensitive contents in key(s) or value(s) '{"KeyManagement__AES__UseKeyDeriviation", "KeyManagement__Provider"}'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove sensitive content from configMap data value

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: configmap kamus-encryptor in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Can elevate its own privileges
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'controller' of Deployment 'kamus-controller' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'set containers[].securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to 'false'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Default capabilities: some containers do not drop all
Misconfigurations.Description: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'controller' of Deployment 'kamus-controller' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Add 'ALL' to containers[].securityContext.capabilities.drop.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs as root user
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the running image to run as a non-root user to ensure least privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'controller' of Deployment 'kamus-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true.

Misconfigurations.Title: Root file system is not read-only
Misconfigurations.Description: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'controller' of Deployment 'kamus-controller' should set 'securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to true
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Change 'containers[].securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to 'true'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'controller' of Deployment 'kamus-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsUser' to an integer > 10000.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'controller' of Deployment 'kamus-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to an integer > 10000.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runtime/Default Seccomp profile not set
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Seccomp', the RuntimeDefault seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
Misconfigurations.Message: Either Pod or Container should set 'securityContext.seccompProfile.type' to 'RuntimeDefault'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.securityContext.seccompProfile.type', 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.seccompProfile' and 'spec.initContainers[*].securityContext.seccompProfile' to 'RuntimeDefault' or undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container controller of deployment kamus-controller in default namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE
Misconfigurations.Description: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
Misconfigurations.Message: container should drop all
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.drop' to 'ALL' and only add 'NET_BIND_SERVICE' to 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.add'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: deployment kamus-controller in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'decryptor-api' of Deployment 'kamus-decryptor' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false
